The video shows part of a news segment b: ELECTIONS 2020 / JOE BIDEN LISTED AS CRIMINAL SUSPECT IN UKRAINIAN COURT."
The post: s caption, written in both traditional Chinese and English, claims that Ukraine has listed Joe Biden as wanted on Class A felony charges.
The claim is false: as the original video was published on OAN's YouTube channel on May 21, 2020, titled "Joe Biden listed as criminal suspect in Ukrainian court." The video does not mention "Class A felony charges" and the claim about the Ukrainian case involving Biden is misleading.
